SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() total = filter:CountStopAt( 3 ) local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if (player ~= nil) then filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( player ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_CREATURE_ATTACKING ) filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, player ) if total == 3 then player:SetTargetCount(2) player:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_SACRIFICE" ) player:SetTargetPrompt( 1, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_ANOTHER_CREATURE_TO_SACRIFICE" ) player:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(1) ) else player:SetTargetCount(1) player:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_SACRIFICE" ) player:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(1) ) end end

local target_array = {} for i=0,1 do target_array[i] = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_NthCardPtr(i) end for i=0,1 do if target_array[i] ~= nil then local player = target_array[i]:GetPlayer() target_array[i]:Sacrifice(player) end end
